eto-dashboard-application-description:
Here you can create your ETO application. The information provided will be visible on your ETO profile page as well as setting the smart contract terms of your offering.

You don’t have to fill out your application in one go. You can save the process and return later to make additions or edits. After submitting your application you can still update media links and marketing information.

investment-flow.amount-exceeds-investmen: Due to transaction costs this amount exceeds your investment limit.
investment-flow.amount-to-invest: Amount you would like to  invest
investment-flow.bank-transfer-info-messa: For the Fifth Force ETO you are able to invest via direct bank transfer. Transfers take between 1 to 2 working days to be confirmed and only then tokens will be issued. If the transfer is not confirmed before the end of the sale your money will be returned to your bank account in 1 to 2 days.
investment-flow.bank-transfer-summary.ex: You will receive an email with the below investment summary, if your investment is successful you will recieve another email in 2 to 3 days confirming your investment.
investment-flow.bank-transfer.bank-detai: Funds must be transferred from a bank account matching the verified users' name and country of this account and include your reference number. If the information below does not match with the bank account you are wiring funds from your funds will be returned and no tokens will be issued.
investment-flow.bank-transfer.gas-stipen: I agree to increase my investment by a 10 EUR service fee. The fee will be converted into ETH to pay for future blockchain transactions on the platform.
investment-flow.bank-transfer.general-in: Investments via bank transfer take approx. 4 to 7 business days. In order to complete the transfer, please include the reference number when making the bank transfer. Without this we might not be able to connect the transferred funds with your account. Your funds will be converted to EUR and automatically invested into the Fifth Force ETO. Once received we will send you an email confirmation and will issue the tokens to your account. If the investment is not received before the end of the sale your money will be returned to your bank account within 1 to 2 working days.

investment-flow.message.no-icbm-neu-rewa: As an ICBM investor you have already received a NEU reward for your commitment, therefore you won't get rewarded again.
investment-flow.success.congratulation-t: Congratulations! Your investment transaction has been confirmed. You can view your transaction on {etherscan}. We will notify you when you can claim your Equity Tokens.

kyc.business.beneficial-owner.beneficial: Are there any beneficial owners of this company? Someone qualifies as such if they hold more than 25% of a company's shares. If there is a beneficial owner, please fill in the following details.

kyc.business.legal-representative.pep: Are you a Politically Exposed Person?
kyc.disclaimer.contents:
The following information will be used to verify your identity in compliance with European Know Your Client and Anti Money Laundering policies.

Your information is always kept confidential and for compliance reasons stored for at least 5 years.

By providing your information and clicking “Continue” you are consenting to your data being processed.
kyc.disclaimer.header: Why do we need this information?
kyc.modal.submit-description: Confirm submitting your account verification request
kyc.modal.verification.description: Thank you for completing your identity verification process, our team will check your application and will get in touch within 1 day. To contact support please click here, to continue to your wallet click here.
kyc.modal.verification.title: Verification process is completed
kyc.personal.high-income: Is your income above 5.000 EUR monthly, or do you have more than 100.000 EUR of assets available?
kyc.personal.income.disclaimer: The German Federal Financial Supervisory Authority requires us to ensure that our clients invest within their means
kyc.personal.instant-id.description: Instant Verification: You will be redirected to our verification partner IDNow in order to complete a fast video verification via your computer or mobile camera. After a successful verification, you can invest on the Neufund Platform instantly.
kyc.personal.instant-id.manual-verificat: Manual Verification: If you do not wish to get instantly verified you can choose the manual process. Therefore you have to upload your documents manually. The process may take up to 1 business day.
kyc.personal.politically-exposed.disclai: You will be asked to provide more details about your situation at a later stage.
kyc.personal.politically-exposed.questio: Are you a Politically Exposed Person?
kyc.personal.politically-exposed.tooltip:
A Politically Exposed Person (PEP) is:

  1. is an individual who is or has been entrusted with a prominent function. Many PEPs hold positions that can be abused for the purpose of laundering illicit funds or other predicate offences such as corruption or bribery.
kyc.personal.uploadId.description: Please upload a colored copy of your passport or both sides of your ID card for verification.
kyc.personal.us-citizen.disclaimer: Due to regulatory uncertainties in the US we can currently not accept any US American citizens. Since US law also operates outside of its geographical borders we cannot make an exception even if you are based overseas
kyc.personal.us-citizen.question: Are you a US citizen?

modal.ipfs-eto.description: Ready to go? Once uploaded, your legal document is public and immutable which means you won’t be able to delete it. We use IPFS, a p2p distributed file system, that gives each document a unique hash and timestamp which we link to a smart contract to make them legally binding.

settings.kyc-widget.error: An error occured while loading data
We have generated the transaction data you need to use to migrate your ICBM wallet to the Neufund platform. You do this by sending an empty transaction to the smart contract with the below data. Do not send any funds to this wallet address. Simply copy and paste the below data into the ‘Advanced Data` field of your wallet. Please ensure the you enter 0 as the amount to be send. Not sure how to make the transaction? We made a tutorial to walk you through the steps of most common wallets like Tresor and IM.

There are two transactions that need to take place, the first step is to inform your wallet of an address change, copy the below data to make the transaction or click the icon below to open the pre-loaded transaction in MyEtherWallet. Don’t close this screen as we will monitor the pending transaction and prompt you to the second step once it has gone through.

You have completed the first step and have informed your wallet of an address change, now complete the second transaction using the below details to migrate your funds. Copy the below data to make the transacation or click the icon below to open the pre-loaded transaction in MyEtherWallet. Don’t close this screen as we will monitor the pending transaction and confirm the transaction once it has gone through.

wallet-selector.ledger-not-supported: Your browser does not support NeuKey. For security reasons we require a recent version of:
wallet-selector.ledger.start.browser-sup: Ensure you enable "Browser support" on your ledger
wallet-selector.ledger.start.step1.descr: Connect your Ledger Nano via USB and get your PIN code ready
wallet-selector.ledger.start.step2.descr: Use the left and right buttons to enter your PIN. Press two buttons at once to confirm
wallet-selector.ledger.start.step3.descr: Press the buttons to scroll through apps and choose Ethereum. Press two buttons at once to confirm

wallet-selector.ledger.start.step6.descr: Choose Yes and press 2 butttons at once to confirm choice
wallet-selector.light.icbm-info.message:
Are you new to the world of blockchain? Then the Light Wallet is a good starting point. For enhanced security we strongly suggest registering with a Ledger Nano.

Are you an ICBM investor? Please create your account using the wallet with which you made your ICBM commitment.

If you decide to create a Light Wallet keep in mind that only you control this wallet. You are fully responsible for its security, including your private key or phrase. Neufund never sees any private keys, nor signs and doesn’t execute any transactions. Neither do we provide recovery services.
wallet-selector.neuwallet.login-instruct: To login, please click on the Access Link you received after creating your Light Wallet

wallet-selector.recover.help.wallet-id-m: I can't find my wallet ID
wallet-selector.recover.seed.recover-des: Use the recovery phrase to recover your Light Wallet. Only then you can reset your password.
wallet-selector.recover.seed.register-de: Your wallet will be imported into a new Neufund account
